alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Marathon; Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 2:29PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Scattered showers and isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of Lincoln, western Vilas, north central Marathon and western Oneida Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered showers and isolated thunderstorms along a line extending from Mercer to near Willow Reservoir to near Spirit to 10 miles west of Chelsea. The showers and thunderstorms were moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Squirrel Lake around 235 PM CDT. Willow Reservoir around 240 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include New Wood Wildlife Area, Rice Creek Natural Area, Newbold, Boulder Junction, Rhinelander, Woodboro, Birch Trails Girl Scout Camp, Crystal Lake Scout Reservation, Merrill and Council Grounds State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
